meanings.definition: A motor protein that moves along microtubules in cells
meanings.sent1: The dyneins powered the movement of materials within the cell.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the dyneins to understand how cells transport cargo.
meanings.sent3: The dyneins in the cell were known for their speedy delivery of packages.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny engines, the dyneins raced along the microtubules in the cell.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the dyneins appeared as tiny workers bustling along the cell highways.
